etomica.box

Class BoxAgentManager<E>

  • java.lang.Object
    • etomica.box.BoxAgentManager<E>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ISimulationListener

    public class BoxAgentManager<E>
extends java.lang.Object
implements ISimulationListener
    BoxAgentManager acts on behalf of client classes (a BoxAgentSource) to manage agents for each Box in a simulation. When Box instances are added or removed from the simulation, the agents array (indexed by the box's index) is updated. The client should call getAgents() at any point where a Box might have have been added to (or removed from) the system because the old array would be stale at that point.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  BoxAgentManager.AgentIterator<E>
      Iterator that loops over the agents, skipping null elements
      static interface  BoxAgentManager.BoxAgentSource<E>
      Interface for an object that makes an agent to be placed in each atom upon construction.
